subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: Meredith Michaels-Beerbaum of Germany and her 16-year-old gelding Shutterfly won the World Cup title for show jumpers with two fault-free rounds in Las Vegas. The score of zero penalties was two better than the total posted by McLain Ward of Brewster, N.Y., and his mare Sapphire. Michaels-Beerbaum became only the second rider to score a triple in the World Cup final.
